resources.string: The application provides the list of different items as well as search option, where you can either explore the list or search for items from the product list to get its recycling information.
To make it easier for you to classify the items, we have incorporated scan an object functionality, which gives the item description and the optimal disposal container.
You can view the calendar to know the pickup date of the garbage collection
You can know the location where you donate your old clothes and shoes
The application is developed by dalhousie students. If you face any issues while using the application, please send us query on recyclemadeeasy@dal.com
